description:
One of http://anidb.net/ch25305 [Yuki]`s new friends in his new school. Her father is actually http://anidb.net/ch36461 [Tsukishima Karyuudo], the Tenth Diary user. Although she initially attempted to kill http://anidb.net/ch25305 [Yuki], http://anidb.net/ch25306 [Yuno], http://anidb.net/ch36464 [Aki] and http://anidb.net/ch25308 [Kousaka], she did so under her father`s promise (later revealed to be a lie) that they could be a family again. After her father`s death, she helps Yuki whenever possible.
She is named after Apollo, the Greek god of the prophecy.
Source: wiki
name: Hino Hinata
